u:update.u:name: utPLSQL for SQL Developer
u:update.u:author: Philipp Salvisberg
u:update.u:description: Extension for running unit tests in SQL Developer.

u:update.u:name: oddgen for SQL Developer
u:update.u:author: Philipp Salvisberg
u:update.u:description: SQL Developer extension to invoke dictionary driven code generators.

u:update.u:name: Bitemp Remodeler for SQL Developer
u:update.u:author: Philipp Salvisberg
u:update.u:description: SQL Developer extension to generate non-temporal, uni-temporal and bi-temporal table API.

u:update.u:name: db* CODECOP for SQL Developer
u:update.u:author: Trivadis AG
u:update.u:description: db* CODECOP for SQL Developer is an extension to check an editor content for compliance violations of the Trivadis PL/SQL & SQL Coding Guidelines Version 4.0 (see https://trivadis.github.io/plsql-and-sql-coding-guidelines/v4.0/). Furthermore McCabe's cyclomatic complexity, Halstead's volume, the maintainability index and some other software metrics are calculated for each PL/SQL unit and aggregated on file level. The results are presented in an additional tabbed panel. One tab shows all guideline violations to quickly navigate to the corresponding code position, the other tab contains a full HTML report, which also may be opened in your external browser.

u:update.u:name: Trivadis PL/SQL Unwrapper for SQL Developer
u:update.u:author: Trivadis AG
u:update.u:description: Trivadis PL/SQL Unwrapper for SQL Developer is an extension to unwrap an editor content.

u:update.u:name: plscope-utils for SQL Developer
u:update.u:author: Philipp Salvisberg
u:update.u:description: SQL Developer extension to intergrate PL/Scope.

u:update.u:name: Show Me Password SQL Developer 18c
u:update.u:author: TomeCode.com
u:update.u:description: The Show me password is extension for Oracle SQL Developer i.e. tool that decrypts all saved (encrypted) password for database connections in SQL Developer.
